about_the_game:
Through the lens of a webcam, The Link connects you with your in-game character.


Forget treadmills and dumbbells—train with the games that ignite your passion. Imagine the thrill of jogging through breathtaking virtual realms, from the icy landscapes of Winterspring to the dense, mysterious forests of Feralas. As you mine precious resources, battle formidable foes, and complete epic quests, your fitness journey becomes an adventure.

Visualize yourself strolling through the awe-inspiring Lands Between, casting powerful spells to vanquish the shadows that dare to cross your path. Picture the adrenaline rush as you race through the vibrant streets of Los Santos in GTA, exchanging blows with unruly pedestrians or speeding through the city as the sun dips below the horizon.

Now, with latest computer vision technology, The Link enhances your ordinary webcam, turning it into a motion capture device. This is more than just technology—it’s your gateway to a new way of playing, of living. Simply show The Link the gestures or voice commands you want it to learn, and it will seamlessly translate your movements into in-game actions, empowering you to take control in ways you never experience before.

The most straightforward solution for motion-sensing gameplay is here, ready to elevate your gaming and your fitness to new heights. Step into the future with me—where every move you make in the game world brings you closer to your goals in the real world!

name: The Link

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: None
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Your computer needs to have a webcam(support 720P) and a microphone.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent AMD processor, 3.1 GHz or faster.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: None
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A webcam that supports 60 fps at 720p with a wide field of view (FOV) is recommended.

short_description: This application lets you use a webcam and a microphone to play any game with real-world movements and voice commands.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
